## SinHNode class

Computes the hyperbolic sine function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class SinHNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns sinh(x) = (e^x - e^(-x)) / 2 Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
